issue.message: WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE no longer provides write access when targeting Android 10+
This field should be annotated with `ChecksSdkIntAtLeast(api=android.os.Build.VERSION_CODES.KITKAT)`
Unnecessary; SDK_INT is always >= 23
